comment: Last month with and of course my Internet goes down again , yesterday and again today . Will not miss this . How am I supposed to work like this ? ?
amr:
# ::snt Last month with and of course my Internet goes down again , yesterday and again today . Will not miss this . How am I supposed to work like this ? ?
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (g / go-01
            :ARG1 (ii / internet
                  :poss (ii2 / i))
            :ARG4 (d / down)
            :mod (o / of-course)
            :time (m2 / month
                  :mod (l / last))
            :frequency (a / and
                  :op1 (y / yesterday)
                  :op2 (y2 / yesterday)
                  :op3 (t / today)))
      :snt2 (m3 / miss-02
            :polarity -
            :ARG0 (ii3 / i)
            :ARG1 (t2 / this))
      :snt3 (s / suppose-02
            :ARG1 (ii4 / i)
            :ARG2 (w / work-01
                  :ARG0 ii4
                  :ARG1-of (r / resemble-01
                        :ARG2 (t3 / this)))
            :manner (a2 / amr-unknown)))

comment: Hi there , have you got a ticket number for us to escalate ?
